name: Construct 3 template mobile game - Captain barrelcat
name_original: Construct 3 template mobile game - Captain barrelcat
description:
This is a Construct 3 template project that is also playable in the playstore . You can either use it as a startingpoint for your game or you can use the  created assets made by me that are in the template for commercial purposes.

To try the game out you can also play in the playstore on mobile devices:

Captain barrelcat for Construct 3 is a Contruct 3 template project that contain objects that will enable you to:

  • Save your highscore and show it on the startscreen
  • Switch instant between different levels when playing the game and keeping your current score to the next level
  • Collecting points 
  • Getting a power mode where you are invincible!
  • Game over screen
  • Start screen
  • 2 level design
  • 2d/ 3d enviorment
